post:
Hi LET,

I just discovered a good offer which I wanted to share with you (not exactly for cheapskates). I am not affiliated with that provider in any way, but only heard good things about them so far.

GBServers runs a 50% promotion right now on their Maidenhead location (Pulsant DC). Their server range from 6,25 GBP to 71,99 GBP -50% of course.

So cheapest would be:

<pre>
XENPV-256

256 MB RAM
18 GB Raid 10 Storage
300 GB Premium Traffic

1 IP Address Included
Choice of Linux OS
1Gbps Uplink
Enterprise Supermicro Hardware
SolusVM Powered
99.9% Uptime Guarantee
14 Day Money Back Guarantee
FREE Redundant Hosted DNS Service
Instant Setup
</pre>

Sounds like a fair price for a good provider. I personally don't need it right now, but wanted to share with you anyway.

Coupon Code: 7yearsold

Test IP: 185.10.201.25
Speed Test: http://185.10.201.25/test.100M

Offer URL:
http://www.gbservers.co.uk/cheap-xenpv-vps/

Please don't ask me questions about it as I am not affiliated with them and I do not have services with them.
